publicationstmt.publisher: Oregon Historical Society Davies Family Research Library

profiledesc.descrules: Finding aid based on DACS (Describing Archives: A Content Standard)

repository.corpname: Oregon Historical Society, Davies Family Research Library

address.addressline: Oregon Historical Society Davies Family Research Library

did.abstract: Collection includes: Typescript copy extracts from the diary and other papers of Welborn Beeson, 9 pp, 1860-1876, regarding events surrounding the Civil War and information about the Grange; Biographical information regarding John Beeson and his opposition to the United States government's hostilities towards Indians; Photocopy newspaper clippings, 1892-1967, regarding Welborn's military service and the Siskiyou Massacre of 1855; Typescript copy anecdote by Ellis Beeson, 9 pp, ca. 1969, regarding his adventures as part of a pack train in Southern Oregon, 1918.

scopecontent.p: Collection includes: Typescript copy extracts from the diary and other papers of Welborn Beeson, 9 pp, 1860-1876, regarding events surrounding the Civil War and information about the Grange; Biographical information regarding John Beeson and his opposition to the United States government's hostilities towards Indians; Photocopy newspaper clippings, 1892-1967, regarding Welborn's military service and the Siskiyou Massacre of 1855; Typescript copy anecdote by Ellis Beeson, 9 pp, ca. 1969, regarding his adventures as part of a pack train in Southern Oregon, 1918.

accessrestrict.p: This collection is open to the public.

userestrict.p: The Oregon Historical Society is the owner of the materials in the Research Library and makes available reproductions for research, publication, and other uses. Written permission must be obtained from the Research Library prior to any use of reproductions. The Society does not necessarily hold copyright to all the materials in the collections. In some cases, permission for use of reproductions may require seeking additional authorization from the copyright holders.

prefercite.p: Welborn Beeson collection, Mss 1509, Oregon Historical Society Research Library.
